Description:
Al Amal Business Solutions is seeking an Administrative Assistant - Logistics for an Ultra Luxury Hotel in Saudi Arabia. In this role, you will be responsible for supporting the logistics department with administrative tasks. You will be working in a fast-paced environment with a team of professionals.Provide administrative support to the logistics department
Maintain records of inventory, supplies, and equipment
Assist with scheduling meetings and coordinating logistics for events
Handle procurement processes in coordination with the procurement department
Generate reports and provide regular updates to the management team
Communicate with vendors, suppliers, and other stakeholders to ensure timely delivery of products and services
Assist with preparing and reviewing invoices and purchase ordersJob Details
